TopicTitle: how to master this stupid camera and the editor on the plane/rocket

Articles.Content: hi i buyed this game two days ago and have not played it because i cant find out how to do anything i played the demo many times but its all different its takes me really long time to just put wheels on the plane because the game wants to set them upsidedown and the camera also doesnt do what i want sometimes its hard to even see the backside of the ship i just think the camera and the editor really should be worked on when i want it to build Horizontaly it shall build Horizontaly i dont want to press the qwerasd keys just to turn the rockets/items the right way....

Sadly, until some kind of brain hat interface is developed to enable the game to know what you want, you will have to use the WASDEQ keys. You can right-click and drag to move the camera, as well as the + and - keys to zoom, and the PgUp and PgDn keys to raise/lower the camera.

I think a system like in Maya, where the objects have handles that restrict movement to one axis, will be best.

Do we know what is planned or should I put this as a suggestion?
I don\'t honestly think it needs it - never had any serious issues with this myself (well - not since I found out about PgUp and PgDn, anyway).
